text: Bityo kubera kwica isezerano ryabo rikomeye, twarabavumye tunadanangira imitima yabo kuko bahindura amagambo (ya Allah ari muri Tawurati) bakayakura mu myanya yayo, kandi banirengagije igice kinini (cy’ubutumwa) bibutswaga. Ndetse ntuzahwema kubabonaho ubuhemu, uretse bake muri bo. Ku bw’ibyo, bababarire unirengagize (ibibi byabo). Mu by’ukuri, Allah akunda abakora ibyiza
